content.question: (a) Describe the relationship between a parasite and its host.

frqParts.text: (a) Describe the relationship between a parasite and its host.

(b) Explain how producing the enzymes that digest <math alttext="alpha pinene" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">α</mi><mrow><mtext>-</mtext><mtext>pinene</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is beneficial to the bacterial species living within the nematodes.

(c) Predict the effect of the antibiotic treatments on the mortality rate of the nematodes when exposed to <math alttext="alpha pinene" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">α</mi><mrow><mtext>-</mtext><mtext>pinene</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>.
(d) Provide reasoning to justify your prediction in part (c).
